effect_entries.effect: May be traded to Captain Stern for a []{item:deep-sea-tooth} or a []{item:deep-sea-scale}.
effect_entries.short_effect: Trade to Captain Stern for a DeepSeaTooth or DeepSeaScale.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A device used to search for
life-forms in water.
It looks too difficult to use.

A device found
inside the
ABANDONED SHIP.
